mapper.insert: insert into t_bd_item_info (item_no, item_subno, item_name, item_subname, item_clsno, item_brand, item_brandname, unit_no, item_size, price, base_price, sale_price, combine_sta, status, display_flag, po_cycle, so_cycle, automin_flag, en_dis, change_price, purchase_tax, sale_tax, purchase_spec, shipment_spec, item_supcust, main_supcust, item_stock, build_date, modify_date, stop_date, abc, branch_price, item_rem, vip_price, sale_min_price, com_flag, vip_acc_flag, vip_acc_num, dpfm_type, return_rate, update_date, pro_code1, pro_code2, pro_code3, pro_code4, pro_code5, pro_code6, item_picture, sale_flag, scheme_price, vip_price2, vip_price3, vip_price4, vip_price5, valid_days, memo, item_com, product_area, measure_flag, item_sup_flag, sup_rate, picture_type, base_price1, base_price2, base_price3, base_price4, base_price5, base_price6, base_price7, base_price8, new_oper_id, modify_oper_id, en_gift, promote_flag, allow_flag, hand_flag, alert_day1, alert_day2 ) values (#{itemNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{itemSubno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemSubname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemClsno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{itemBrand,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{proCode4,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{proCode5,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{proCode6,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{itemPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{schemePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemCom,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{productArea,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{measureFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{itemSupFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{supRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pictureType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allowFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{handFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{alertDay1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alertDay2,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

#{alertDay2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.select: SELECT a.item_no as itemBarcode, a.price as itemInPrice, a.item_name as itemName, a.item_brand as itemBrand, a.item_clsno as itemClass, a.item_subno as itemNo, a.item_size as itemSize, a.unit_no itemUnitNo , a.modify_date as modifyDate, a.sale_price as itemSalePrice, a.vip_price as itemVipPrice, a.main_supcust as itemSupNo, sum(b.in_qty) as stockQty, a.build_date as createTime FROM t_bd_item_info a LEFT JOIN t_im_batch b on a.item_no = b.item_no GROUP BY a.item_no
